about_the_game:
The EMD F7 is a model of 1,500-horsepower (1,100 kW) diesel-electric locomotive produced between February 1949 and December 1953 by the Electro-Motive Division of General Motors (EMD) and General Motors Diesel (GMD).

Although originally promoted by EMD as a freight-hauling unit, the F7A was also used in passenger service hauling trains such as the KCS White F7A high-speed flagship trains, the Super Chief, & El Capitan, and the Ontario Northland's Northlander.

This is the F7A / B in KCS liveries. The locomotives support various advanced features like fuel consumption depending on your driving skills and they can even get dirty while you are driving with them. Search for 3DZug on the Trainz Wiki for more information on 'advanced features'.

 

Features:
- F7A and F7B units included

- ACS coupling supported

- running numbers

- animated fans

- custom headlight

- dynamic fuel consumption

- weathering skins
- dynamic weathering 

 

Liveries:
- KSC white
- KSC red ( two different liveries)
- KCS yellow

This is the F7A / B in KCS liveries. The locomotives support various advanced features like fuel consumption depending on your driving skills and they can even get dirty while you are driving with them. Search for 3DZug on the Trainz Wiki for more information on 'advanced features'.
